main.name: FREY
main.description: currently employed by Euro Information Développement as an Apprentice Analyst Developer in Strasbourg city
main.bio: Apprenticeship Engineering student, I am passionate about web, design, photography and new technologies. I accumulate nearly 5 years of professional experience. I’ m currently working as an alternate at Euro Information Développement in the field of IT Banking, where I develop programming and project management skills.
main.contactmessage: You can directly send an email to me thanks to this form

testimonials.text: ''These missions allowed him to acquire technical skills, really good relations with our clients and the sense of organization. Mister Frey has always maintained very good relations with our clients, his colleagues and his superiors. During this period, Mister Frey was able to demonstrate seriousness, motivation, efficiency, human qualities and autonomy, and his skills allowed him to progress and perform these tasks to our entire satisfaction, in the compliance with the objectives set.''
